fieldUpdates.description: Updates Initial_Account_ID field to store the ID of initial associated Account
fieldUpdates.name: Update Initial Account ID

Sets Is Account Changed checkbox if Case was associates to an Account while creation, and this Initial Account is changed to a different Account STCP1-636
rules.formula: AND ( Is_account_associated__c, ISCHANGED(AccountId), NOT(ISBLANK(AccountId)), Initial_Account_ID__c <> AccountId )

rules.description: 1) Sets the check-box field to TRUE to if the case was associated with an Account while creation by email-to-case; 2) Sets ID of the initially associated Account in the Initial Account ID STCP1-636

rules.formula: AND( RecordType.Name ="Russian Cases" , ISCHANGED( Requested_by__c ), TEXT(Origin)= 'Other' )

rules.description: STCP1-251/ saving the date time when owner is changed first time from queue to user (Support record Type)
rules.formula: AND( ISCHANGED(OwnerId), LEFT(PRIORVALUE(OwnerId),3) = '00G', LEFT(OwnerId,3) = '005', ISBLANK(First_Owner_Change_Date__c), OR(RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Support', RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Support_CCS') )

rules.description: Saves email of associated Account on case (STCP1-619)
STCP1-56/STCP1-330 - save initial case queue name/using in reports to collect statistic of case distribution by queue

rules.fullName: Set Case owner to Shell Premium
rules.description: used for omni-channel (if language is changed, then set case owner back to initial case queue)
